page.title: 19SCHOOL NOW AND 20 YEARS AGO
page.content: IN OUR TOWN THERE ARE 2 COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS, ST.BIRINUS' AND DICOT GIRLS',AND 5 PRIMARY SCHOOLS. A TEACHER WHO HAS BEEN HERE FOR OVER 20 YEARS SAID THAT WHEN SHE STARTED WORK,PUPILS BEHAVED BETTER BECAUSE THEY RESPECTED THEIR ELDERS; WHEN STAFF CAME INTO THEIR LESSONS THERE WAS ABSOLUTE SILENCE.20 YEARS AGO,MISS. LARDNER WAS HEADMISTRESS.PUPILS COULD TAKE 9 EXAM.SUBJECTS.THE BUILDING WAS DIFFERENT AND THE UNIFORM WAS GREEN AND WHITE FOR THE SECONDARY MODERN SCHOOL AND BLUE AND WHITE FOR THE GRAMMAR SCHOOL.THERE WERE 8 LESSONS WITH BREAKS BOTH IN THE MORNING AND AFTERNOON.EVERYONE HAD TO LINE UP IN SILENCE IN THE FRONT YARD BEFORE THEY WERE ALLOWED IN.EACH LESSON LASTED 30 MINUTES.MOST OF THE RULES WERE THE SAME AS NOW -E.G. NO JEWELLERY-CONT
